CancellationId.description: Unique identifier of the recall request as assigned by the initiating party.

OriginalTransactionId.description: Unique identifier of the original payment transaction, as assigned by ClearBank, to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identifier is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

ReasonCode.description: The reason code used to recall the payment.

TimestampCreated.description: Date and time the recall was requested, in UTC.

AdditionalInformation.description: Additional information provided by the initiating party about the recall.
